languages.text: "Мудрое решение, шерин! Знаете, как говорят хладные торговцы? Если можешь решить проблему звонкой монетой, то это всего лишь еще один пункт расходов!"

traits.locale_text: "Мудрое решение, шерин! Знаете, как говорят Хладные Торговцы? Если можешь решить проблему звонкой монетой, то это всего лишь еще один пункт расходов!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "A wise decision, shereen! Cold Traders always say: if you can solve a problem with hard cash, then that's just the cost of doing business!"
languages.original_text: "Мудрое решение, шерин! Знаете, как говорят хладные торговцы? Если можешь решить проблему звонкой монетой, то это всего лишь еще один пункт расходов!"

traits.locale_text: "A wise decision, shereen! Cold Traders always say: if you can solve a problem with hard cash, then that's just the cost of doing business!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "A wise decision, shereen! Cold Traders always say: if you can solve a problem with hard cash, then that's just the cost of doing business!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "A wise decision, shereen! Cold Traders always say: if you can solve a problem with hard cash, then that's just the cost of doing business!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "A wise decision, shereen! Cold Traders always say: if you can solve a problem with hard cash, then that's just the cost of doing business!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “真是个明智的决定，亲爱的！冷市商人都是这么说的：如果问题可以靠钱解决，那花在这上面的钱，仅仅是做生意的成本而已！”
languages.original_text: "A wise decision, shereen! Cold Traders always say: if you can solve a problem with hard cash, then that's just the cost of doing business!"

traits.locale_text: “真是个明智的决定，亲爱的！冷市商人都是这么说的：如果问题可以靠钱解决，那花在这上面的钱，仅仅是做生意的成本而已！”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «¡Sabia decisión, shereen! Los Comerciantes Fríos siempre decimos que, si puedes resolver un problema a golpe de talonario, ¡cuenta como coste operativo!».
languages.original_text: "A wise decision, shereen! Cold Traders always say: if you can solve a problem with hard cash, then that's just the cost of doing business!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Sabia decisión, shereen! Los Comerciantes Fríos siempre decimos que, si puedes resolver un problema a golpe de talonario, ¡cuenta como coste operativo!».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「賢い選択だわ、シャリーン！闇商人を担う者たちはこう言うのよ。金で問題を解決できるならただの必要経費だ、ってね！」
languages.original_text: "A wise decision, shereen! Cold Traders always say: if you can solve a problem with hard cash, then that's just the cost of doing business!"

traits.locale_text: 「賢い選択だわ、シャリーン！闇商人を担う者たちはこう言うのよ。金で問題を解決できるならただの必要経費だ、ってね！」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Sage décision, shereen ! Comme disent toujours les adeptes du Commerce Froid, si l'on peut régler un problème moyennant finance, c'est un faible prix à payer pour que les affaires tournent ! »
languages.original_text: "A wise decision, shereen! Cold Traders always say: if you can solve a problem with hard cash, then that's just the cost of doing business!"

traits.locale_text: « Sage décision, shereen ! Comme disent toujours les adeptes du Commerce Froid, si l'on peut régler un problème moyennant finance, c'est un faible prix à payer pour que les affaires tournent ! »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Eine kluge Entscheidung, Shereen! Kalthändler sagen immer: Ein Problem mit Bargeld zu lösen, ist schlichtweg ein Kostenblock des Geschäfts."
languages.original_text: "A wise decision, shereen! Cold Traders always say: if you can solve a problem with hard cash, then that's just the cost of doing business!"

traits.locale_text: "Eine kluge Entscheidung, Shereen! Kalthändler sagen immer: Ein Problem mit Bargeld zu lösen, ist schlichtweg ein Kostenblock des Geschäfts."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Akıllıca bir karar şirinim! Soğuk Tacirler hep şöyle der: Sorununu parayla çözebiliyorsan ufak bir bedelden fazlasını ödemen gerekmez!"
languages.original_text: "A wise decision, shereen! Cold Traders always say: if you can solve a problem with hard cash, then that's just the cost of doing business!"
